moduleMetadataJson.name: Multi Manage File Compressor
moduleMetadataJson.description:
This module zips a file or a directory. On Linux, it uses the zip command.
          On Windows, it will try to use remote target's 7Zip if found. If not, it falls
          back to its Windows Scripting Host.
author: sinn3r <sinn3r@metasploit.com>

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: SESSION
options.description: The session to run this module on.

options.name: SOURCE
options.description: The directory or file to compress
